Properties.Name: Camera ID
Properties.Help:
ID of your camera noramlly just 1/2/3 etc incremented,
 supports multiple camera outputs comma seperated ie 1,2,3 (no spaces)

Properties.Name: Snapshot mode
Properties.Help: Replaces MJPG video feed with snapshots instead, might be useful for browser compatability, Also enables auto scaling

Properties.Name: Scale image
Properties.Help: tick to scale image to set resolution and ratio, untick to maintain images original ratio

Properties.Name: Image background RGB value (if it has background and scale not enabled)
Properties.Help: the RGB value comma seperated eg 255,255,255 of the background
